description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky and given to them by the Galley-La Company and Franky Family. In this episode, it is anchored off the coast of Dressrosa.

keyEvents.title: Giolla Invades the Thousand Sunny
keyEvents.description: Giolla of the Donquixote Pirates boards the Thousand Sunny and confronts the crew members guarding it.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes the target of the Donquixote Pirates' plan to trap the Straw Hats.

keyEvents.title: Thousand Sunny Transformed into Art
keyEvents.description: Giolla uses her Ato Ato no Mi powers to transform the entire ship into abstract art, rendering it unable to sail.
keyEvents.significance: The ship is temporarily disabled as part of Doflamingo's plan to prevent the Straw Hats from escaping Dressrosa.

statusHistory.reason: Transformed into abstract art by Giolla's devil fruit powers

description: A large colosseum in Dressrosa where gladiator battles are held. The Corrida Colosseum is hosting a tournament with the Mera Mera no Mi as the prize.

keyEvents.title: Block C Battle Royale
keyEvents.description: Block C of the tournament begins with numerous gladiators fighting, including Luffy (as Lucy) and Hajrudin.
keyEvents.significance: Major tournament progression as Block C participants battle for advancement.

keyEvents.title: Lucy Defeats Hajrudin
keyEvents.description: Luffy defeats the giant Hajrudin with a single Haki-infused punch, shocking the entire crowd.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Lucy as a tournament favorite and demonstrates the level of competition.

keyEvents.title: Ricky and Rebecca Meet
keyEvents.description: In the colosseum's medical treatment area, Ricky encounters Rebecca and seems to recognize her.
keyEvents.significance: Hints at the deeper connections between characters in Dressrosa.
